title: KHR_gaussian_splatting glTF Mesh Primitive Extension
description: Data defining a 3D Gaussian Splat primitive.

kernel.description: Optional property specifying parameters regarding the kernel used to generate the Gaussians. This property defaults to ellipse.

projection.description: Optional property specifying how to project the Gaussians to achieve a perspective correct value. This property defaults to perspective.

sortingMethod.description: Optional property specifying how to sort the Gaussians during rendering. This property defaults to cameraDistance.

colorSpace.description: Optional property specifying the color space of the spherical harmonics. This property defaults to BT.709.
